info.title: Device Settings Accessibility Resource Type

voice-guide.description: Turns on or off voice guide.

video-description.description: Turns on or off video description.

caption.description: Turns on or off accessibility caption.

caption-mode.description: Accessibility Caption Mode. Client can change caption-mode using supported-caption-modes property.

supported-caption-modes.description: The array of possible caption modes the device supports. This property should be added if caption-mode is supported.

high-contrast.description: Turns on or off high contrast.

enlarge.description: Turns on or off print enlargement.
